channel.title: Friendly Snarks Attempt to Attack Teammates (Team Deathmatch)
channel.description: Title. Even with friendly fire off, teammate's Snarks will jump at you and make the biting sound but no damage. This can be pretty annoying if you're trying to step your Snark placement game up :stuck_out_tongue: . Also, I would assume it would be even more annoying when you need your snarks to not be distracted and attack the enemy.

item.title: Friendly Snarks Attempt to Attack Teammates (Team Deathmatch)
item.dc:creator: Kil3r101
item.description:
Title. Even with friendly fire off, teammate’s Snarks will jump at you and make the biting sound but no damage. This can be pretty annoying if you’re trying to step your Snark placement game up . Also, I would assume it would be even more annoying when you need your snarks to not be distracted and attack the enemy.
